script.name: plugin.tradesys.cmd.wsearch.menu
script.description: Trading System Extension MK2: Ware Search command menu
script.sourceplaintext:
$page.id = get global variable: name='pageid.tradesys' $table.settings = get global variable: name='menu.tradesys.settings' if not $table.settings $table.settings = table alloc set global variable: name='menu.tradesys.settings' value=$table.settings end
if $a.event == [MEvent.Start] $table.closed = table alloc set global variable: name='menu.tradesys.closed' value=$table.closed gosub sub.GetWare return $input
else if $a.event == [MEvent.IsHidden] do if $a.obj -> get true amount of ware Trading System Extension MK2 in cargo bay return [FALSE] return [TRUE]
else if $a.event == 'tradesys.wsearch' do if $a.data return [TRUE]
else if $a.event == 'ware' set global variable: name='menu.tradesys.ware' value=$a.data gosub sub.BuildMenu
skip if $search.type $search.type = 0 set menu option: $menu, set default tab=$search.type
return $input
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Switch] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2] if $menu.id == 'tradesys.wsearch' $table.settings[$selection] = $value end gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Hotkey] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2] if $menu.id == 'tradesys.wsearch' if $selection == 'details' $input = create input: id='details' object info page, object=$value return $input else if $selection == 'dockat' set global variable: name='menu.tradesys.ware' value=null set global variable: name='menu.tradesys.station' value=$value $input = create menu return to previous menu: value=$value return $input else if $selection == 'sector' $sector = $value -> get sector $input = create input: open sector map, id='sector', sector=$sector return $input end end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Context] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2] if $menu.id == 'tradesys.wsearch' if is datatype[ $selection ] == DATATYPE_STATION if $value == 'details' $input = create input: id='details' object info page, object=$selection return $input else if $value == 'sector' $sector = $selection -> get sector $input = create input: open sector map, id='sector', sector=$sector return $input else if $value == 'dockat' set global variable: name='menu.tradesys.ware' value=null set global variable: name='menu.tradesys.station' value=$selection $input = create menu return to previous menu: value=$selection return $input else if $value == 'buy' $search.ware = get global variable: name='menu.tradesys.ware' if not $a.obj -> can transport ware $search.ware START speak text: page=[Page.MiscVoice] id=32 priority=30 else if not $a.obj -> get free amount of ware $search.ware in cargo bay START speak text: page=[Page.MiscVoice] id=1253 priority=30 else set global variable: name='menu.tradesys.buy.station' value=$selection gosub sub.BuyWareMenu return $input end else if $value == 'sell' $search.ware = get global variable: name='menu.tradesys.ware' if not $a.obj -> get amount of ware $search.ware in cargo bay $ware.id = get text id: ware=$search.ware $speak = create new array, arguments=[Page.ObjDesc], $ware.id, [Page.MiscVoice], 25, null START speak array: $speak prio=30 $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=13, $search.ware, null, null, null, null display game tip: text=$read.text delay=5000 else set global variable: name='menu.tradesys.sell.station' value=$selection gosub sub.SellWareMenu return $input end end end end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.TabChanged] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] if $menu.id == 'tradesys.wsearch' $search.type = $table.settings['search.type'] if $search.type != $selection $table.settings['search.type'] = $selection gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu end end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Select] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[3] if $menu.id == 'buy.ware' $search.ware = get global variable: name='menu.tradesys.ware' if $selection == 'quantity' $table.settings[$search.ware][0] = $value else if $selection == 'price' $table.settings[$search.ware][1] = $value end play sample [Sound.Success] gosub sub.BuyWareMenu $input = create input return value: update menu=$menu return $input else if $menu.id == 'sell.ware' $search.ware = get global variable: name='menu.tradesys.ware' if $selection == 'quantity' $table.settings[$search.ware][2] = $value else if $selection == 'price' $table.settings[$search.ware][3] = $value end play sample [Sound.Success] gosub sub.SellWareMenu $input = create input return value: update menu=$menu return $input end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Group] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2] if $menu.id == 'tradesys.wsearch' $table.closed = get global variable: name='menu.tradesys.closed' if $value remove key $selection from table $table.closed else $table.closed[$selection] = [TRUE] end end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Returned] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2] if $menu.id == 'tradesys.wsearch' if $selection == 'buy.ware' if $value set global variable: name='menu.tradesys.sell' value=[FALSE] return [TRUE] end else if $selection == 'sell.ware' if $value set global variable: name='menu.tradesys.sell' value=[TRUE] return [TRUE] end end end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Arguments] $search.ware = get global variable: name='menu.tradesys.ware' if $search.ware $sell = get global variable: name='menu.tradesys.sell' $settings = $table.settings[$search.ware] $qty = $settings[0] $price = $settings[1] if $sell $qty = - $qty $station = get global variable: name='menu.tradesys.sell.station' else $station = get global variable: name='menu.tradesys.buy.station' end $ret = create new array, size=4, elements=$station, $search.ware, $price, $qty, null, null, null, null else $station = get global variable: name='menu.tradesys.station' $ret = create new array, size=4, elements=$station, null, null, null, null, null, null, null end return $ret
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Cancelled] if $a.data == 'tradesys.wsearch' gosub sub.GetWare return $input end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Finished] set global variable: name='menu.tradesys.station' value=null set global variable: name='menu.tradesys.qty' value=null set global variable: name='menu.tradesys.closed' value=null set global variable: name='menu.tradesys.ware' value=null set global variable: name='menu.tradesys.data' value=null set global variable: name='menu.tradesys.lastupdate' value=null set global variable: name='menu.tradesys.buy.station' value=null set global variable: name='menu.tradesys.sell.station' value=null end
return null
sub.BuyWareMenu: $search.ware = get global variable: name='menu.tradesys.ware' $station = get global variable: name='menu.tradesys.buy.station' $menu = create custom menu array
$ware.amt = $station -> get amount of ware $search.ware in cargo bay $ware.free = $a.obj -> get free amount of ware $search.ware in cargo bay $ware.max = get minimum, $ware.amt, $ware.free, null, null, null $price.avg = get average price of ware $search.ware $price.max = get max price of ware $search.ware $price.min = get min price of ware $search.ware
$settings = $table.settings[$search.ware] if not $settings $settings = create new array, arguments=$ware.max, $price.avg, 0, 0, null $table.settings[$search.ware] = $settings end
$default = $settings[0] if not $default $default = $ware.max $settings[0] = $default end $ret = create menu return value: callback, value='quantity' $text = convert number $default to string $text = sprintf: fmt='[%s]', $text, null, null, null, null $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102527 $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text $ware.max = get minimum, $ware.amt, $ware.free, null, null, null add trade bar to menu: $menu, text=$text, min=1, max=$ware.max, current=$default, return value=$ret, left text=' ', right text='%CURRENT%' $default = $settings[1] if not $default $default = $price.avg $settings[1] = $default end $text = convert number $default to string $text = sprintf: fmt='[%s]', $text, null, null, null, null $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Encyclopedia] id=23 $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text $ret = create menu return value: callback, value='price' add price trade bar to menu: $menu, text=$text, min=$price.min, max=$price.max, current=$default, return value=$ret add section to custom menu: $menu $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=7 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue=$station
gosub sub.FillWareMenu
set menu option: $menu, icon=7 set menu option: $menu, maximum menu height=24 lines set menu option: $menu, maximum infolines=20
$read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=9, $search.ware, null, null, null, null $input = create input: id='buy.ware' menu=$menu title=$read.text description=$a.obj callback=null endsub
sub.SellWareMenu: $search.ware = get global variable: name='menu.tradesys.ware' $station = get global variable: name='menu.tradesys.sell.station' $menu = create custom menu array
$ware.amt = $a.obj -> get amount of ware $search.ware in cargo bay $ware.free = $station -> get free amount of ware $search.ware in cargo bay $ware.max = get minimum, $ware.amt, $ware.free, null, null, null $price.avg = get average price of ware $search.ware $price.max = get max price of ware $search.ware $price.min = get min price of ware $search.ware
$settings = $table.settings[$search.ware] if not $settings $settings = create new array, arguments=$ware.max, $price.avg, $ware.max, $price.avg, null $table.settings[$search.ware] = $settings end
gosub sub.FillWareMenu
$default = $settings[2] if not $default $default = $ware.max $settings[2] = $default end $text = convert number $default to string $text = sprintf: fmt='[%s]', $text, null, null, null, null $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102527 $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text $ret = create menu return value: callback, value='quantity' add trade bar to menu: $menu, text=$text, min=1, max=$ware.max, current=$default, return value=$ret, left text=' ', right text='%CURRENT%'
$default = $settings[3] if not $default $default = $price.avg $settings[3] = $default end
$text = convert number $default to string $text = sprintf: fmt='[%s]', $text, null, null, null, null $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Encyclopedia] id=21 $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text $ret = create menu return value: callback, value='price' add price trade bar to menu: $menu, text=$text, min=$price.min, max=$price.max, current=$default, return value=$ret add section to custom menu: $menu
$read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=8 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue=$station
set menu option: $menu, icon=53 set menu option: $menu, maximum menu height=24 lines
$read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=10, $search.ware, null, null, null, null $input = create input: id='sell.ware' menu=$menu title=$read.text description='a.obj' callback=null endsub
sub.FillWareMenu: $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=818 $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$search.ware add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text $text = convert number $price.avg to string $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Encyclopedia] id=22 $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text
$read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=9316 $text = get volume of ware $search.ware if $text $text = convert number $text to string else $text = '-' end $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text
$read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104408 $text = get transport class of ware $search.ware $text = get short transport class name: class=$text $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text
add info line section to menu: $menu $text = $station -> get name $read.text = read text: page=6020 id=2047 $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=715 $text = $station -> get sector $text = $text -> get name $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text $text.cols = array alloc: size=3 $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=706 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=-100 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[0] = $text $amt = $station -> get amount of ware $search.ware in cargo bay $text = convert number $amt to string $max = $station -> get max amount of ware $search.ware that can be stored in cargo bay $text2 = convert number $max to string $text = sprintf: fmt='%s/%s', $text, $text2, null, null, null $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=100 right=[FALSE] colour=[MenuColour.Cyan] text=$text $text.cols[2] = $text $percent = fixed multiply and divide: $amt * 100 / $max $text = create custom menu string progress: width=110 progress=$percent% $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=110 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[1] = $text add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text.cols
add info line section to menu: $menu $text.cols = array alloc: size=3 $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=9212 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=-100 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[0] = $text $amt = $a.obj -> get total volume in cargo bay $text = convert number $amt to string $max = $a.obj -> get cargo bay size $text2 = convert number $max to string $text = sprintf: fmt='%s/%s', $text, $text2, null, null, null $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=100 right=[FALSE] colour=[MenuColour.Cyan] text=$text $text.cols[2] = $text $percent = fixed multiply and divide: $amt * 100 / $max $text = create custom menu string progress: width=110 progress=$percent% $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=110 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[1] = $text add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text.cols $amt = $a.obj -> get amount of ware $search.ware in cargo bay $text = convert number $amt to string
$text = create text for custom menu, left=$search.ware, right=$text add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text endsub
sub.GetWare: $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=6 $input = create input: id='ware', user input=Var/Available Ware, refobj=$a.obj, description=$read.text, without sector=[FALSE], filterclass=null, racemask=null, flags=null, default=null endsub
sub.GetData: $doUpdate = [FALSE] $player.time = playing time $last.update = get global variable: name='menu.tradesys.lastupdate' do if ! $last.update OR $player.time > ( $last.update + 20 ) $doUpdate = [TRUE]
$search.ware = get global variable: name='menu.tradesys.ware' $opt.selling = $table.settings['search.type'] $opt.secondary = $table.settings['secondary'] $opt.docks = $table.settings['docks'] @ $new.data = [THIS] -> call script plugin.tradesys.getdata : Object=$a.obj Ware=$search.ware Selling?=$opt.selling Update Data=$doUpdate Include Secondary=$opt.secondary Include Docks=$opt.docks endsub
sub.BuildMenu: gosub sub.GetData $table.closed = get global variable: name='menu.tradesys.closed' $search.ware = get global variable: name='menu.tradesys.ware' $menu = create custom menu array
$read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=2 add tab to menu: $menu, text=$read.text
$search.type = $table.settings['search.type'] if $search.type $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3 add tab to menu: $menu, text=$read.text end
$avr.price = get average price of ware $search.ware
$text.cols = array alloc: size=2 $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Encyclopedia] id=22 $text = create custom menu column string, position=1 length=150 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[0] = $text $text = convert number $avr.price to string $text = create custom menu column string, position=160 length=150 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[1] = $text add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$text.cols
$read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104260 add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$read.text
$aValues = array alloc: size=2 $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102302 $aValues[0] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102301 $aValues[1] = $read.text if $search.type $default = $table.settings['secondary'] skip if $default $default = 0 $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=4 add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$read.text, value array=$aValues, default=$default, return id='secondary', width=100 allowtabs=[TRUE] end $default = $table.settings['docks'] skip if $default $default = 0 $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=5 add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$read.text, value array=$aValues, default=$default, return id='docks', width=100 allowtabs=[TRUE]
$text.cols = array alloc: size=4 $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102457 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=100 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[0] = $text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=715 $text = create custom menu column string, position=280 length=100 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[1] = $text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=736 $text = create custom menu column string, position=-130 length=40 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[2] = $text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=9209 $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=120 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[3] = $text add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$text.cols
if not size of table $new.data $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=689 add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$read.text else $sorted.prices = sort table keys: table=$new.data
do if $table.settings['search.type'] $sorted.prices = reverse array $sorted.prices
$i = 0 $size = size of array $sorted.prices while $i < $size $price = $sorted.prices[$i] $table.jumps = $new.data[$price] if size of table $table.jumps $sorted.jumps = sort table keys by value: table=$table.jumps $jump.size = size of array $sorted.jumps
$text.cols = array alloc: size=3 $text = convert number $price to string $text = sprintf: fmt='%s %s', $text, [Text.Credits], null, null, null $text = create custom menu column string, position=10 length=90 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[0] = $text $text = convert number $jump.size to string $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102457 $text = sprintf: fmt='[%s: %s]', $read.text, $text, null, null, null $text = create custom menu column string, position=200 length=100 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[2] = $text if $table.settings['search.type'] $price.diff = $price - $avr.price else $price.diff = $avr.price - $price end $text = convert number $price.diff to string if $price.diff > 0 $text = sprintf: fmt='(+%s)', $text, null, null, null, null $text = create custom menu column string, position=110 length=40 right=[FALSE] colour=[MenuColour.Green] text=$text else if $price.diff < 0 $text = sprintf: fmt='(%s)', $text, null, null, null, null $text = create custom menu column string, position=110 length=40 right=[FALSE] colour=[MenuColour.Red] text=$text else $text = sprintf: fmt='(%s)', $text, null, null, null, null $text = create custom menu column string, position=110 length=40 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text end $text.cols[1] = $text
$is.open = [TRUE] do if $table.closed[$price] $is.open = [FALSE] add new grouping to menu: $menu, text=$text.cols, open=$is.open, id=$price, indent=20
$j = 0 while $j < $jump.size $station = $sorted.jumps[$j] $jumps = $table.jumps[$station]
$text.cols = array alloc: size=6 $text = $station ->create custom menu string object icon $text = create custom menu column string, position=20 length=10 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[0] = $text $text = $station -> get name $text = create custom menu column string, position=30 length=250 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[1] = $text $sector = $station -> get sector $text = create custom menu column string, position=280 length=150 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$sector $text.cols[2] = $text $text = convert number $jumps to string $text = create custom menu column string, position=-130 length=40 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[3] = $text $ware.amt = $station -> get amount of ware $search.ware in cargo bay $ware.max = $station -> get max amount of ware $search.ware that can be stored in cargo bay $percent = fixed multiply and divide: $ware.amt * 100 / $ware.max $text = create custom menu string progress: width=120 progress=$percent% $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=120 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[4] = $text $text = convert number $ware.amt to string $text2 = convert number $ware.max to string $text = sprintf: fmt='%s/%s', $text, $text2, null, null, null $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=110 right=[FALSE] colour=[MenuColour.Cyan] text=$text $text.cols[5] = $text
$cant.dock = [TRUE] if $a.obj -> is docking allowed at $station do if $station -> is docking possible of $a.obj $cant.dock = [FALSE] end
do if $cant.dock set menu line option: $menu, selection colour=[MenuColour.Red]
$context = create context menu $read.text = read text: page=[Page.QMenus] id=60301 add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=20, returnvalue='details', hotkey=[Key.Details], disabled=[FALSE] add context menu separator: menu=$context $read.text = get command name: command=COMMAND_DOCKAT add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=21, returnvalue='dockat', hotkey=537, disabled=$cant.dock
if $search.type $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=8 add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=53, returnvalue='sell', hotkey=null, disabled=$cant.dock $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1100006 $ship.amt = $a.obj -> get amount of ware $search.ware in cargo bay $text = convert number $ship.amt to string add context menu global info line: menu=$context, name=$read.text, value=$text else $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=7 add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=7, returnvalue='buy', hotkey=null, disabled=$cant.dock $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1100006 $text = convert number $ware.amt to string add context menu global info line: menu=$context, name=$read.text, value=$text end
add context menu separator: menu=$context $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104078 add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=51, returnvalue='sector', hotkey=[Key.SectorMap], disabled=[FALSE] $read.text = read text: page=[Page.QMenus] id=20301 $text = $station -> get name add context menu global info line: menu=$context, name=$read.text, value=$text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=715 add context menu global info line: menu=$context, name=$read.text, value=$sector $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=9510 $text = convert number $price to string add context menu global info line: menu=$context, name=$read.text, value=$text
$ret = create menu return value: context menu, id=$station, menu=$context, dynamic=[FALSE] add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text.cols returnvalue=$ret inc $j = end
add end grouping to menu: $menu add section to custom menu: $menu end inc $i = end end
add info line heading to menu: $menu, heading=$search.ware $text.id = get text id: ware=$search.ware inc $text.id = add custom menu hyperlinked info: menu=$menu, page id=[Page.ObjDesc], text id=$text.id
if $search.type set menu option: $menu, icon=53 else set menu option: $menu, icon=7 end set menu option: $menu, widthtype=[MenuWidth.Big] set menu option: $menu, remove main header=[TRUE] set menu option: $menu, global hotkey=[Key.Details], id='details' $hotkey = 537 set menu option: $menu, global hotkey=$hotkey, id='dockat' set menu option: $menu, global hotkey=[Key.SectorMap], id='sector'
$guilds.data = get global variable: name='guilds.data' if $guilds.data $input.context = $guilds.data['input.context'] if $input.context $input.context = $input.context['guilds.main'] do if $input.context > 0 set menu option: $menu, input context=$input.context end end
if not $search.type $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=3 add tab to menu: $menu, text=$read.text end
$callback = [Callback.Switch] | [Callback.Group] | [Callback.TabChanged] $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=1 $text = sprintf: fmt='%s: %s', $read.text, $search.ware, null, null, null $input = create input: id='tradesys.wsearch' menu=$menu title=$text description=$a.obj callback=$callback endsub
return null
